website_summaries.verdict: Slightly thinner than some other screen protector options, which works nicely with 3D Touch on the X.
pros: Coated with layers that will resist fingerprints and oils from the skin
Installation is easier than you might think
Uses a thickness of 0.25 mm to enhance the accuracy of touches
Works nicely with many different styles of cases
cons: May not last as long or stand up to drops as well as protectors that are a little thicker

customer_reviews.title: ... have never written a review as I usually have better things to do
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review as I usually have better things to do. However, I had to here. I got my iPhone X on launch day. I begrudgingly put this product on my phone. I got out of my car today and the phone fell face down on uneven gravel. The screen protector completely shattered. I peeled it off and there was not a scratch on the $1150 phone. There was also no residual adhesive on the screen. The pack came with 3 which I originally thought was unnecessary. I will now enthusiastically place number two on when I get home from work. Not bad for about 3 bucks a pop.
customer_reviews.author: Raju Krishna

customer_reviews.title: Cracked, seriously damaged iPhone X screen? Nooooo!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal!! Today I closed my car's trunk door down on my iPhone X. I looked at what appeared to be a massively destroyed screen, with 2 large damaged areas on the right and several large cracks running across the screen; 1st image. But no!!!!! I took off the damaged iPhone X Screen Protector and lo and behold, almost no damage to the iPhone X; there are 2 insignificant scratches 2nd image!!!! Five stars??? You bet!!!! I put on the 2nd iPhone X Screen Protector (3 come in the package; cool!) and my beautiful iPhone X is back!!!
customer_reviews.author: motees

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is excellent deal and quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is excellent deal and quality. The applicator does a really good job of aligning it perfectly so that you don’t have to. Anyone complaining is just being too picky.
customer_reviews.author: BritSpears

customer_reviews.title: Easiest screen protector installation EVER!
customer_reviews.text: By far, this was the easiest screen protector to install. No need to worry about lining up the sides and making sure that it's straight and covers the viewing screen properly. Included in the box is everything you need to put the screen protector correctly the first time. Maxboost provides the stickers to remove any dust or debris on the phone which was nice. They also include a template guide that allows you to drop the screen protector inside the guide allowing for a perfect installation. I've used Maxboost before on older iPhones and have always been pleased. They really stepped up their game with the installation on the new iPhone X.
customer_reviews.author: evilla84

customer_reviews.title: too small, can't cover the screen properly
customer_reviews.text: i installed the protector on my iphone xs. the protector is too small and doesn't provide sufficient area to cover the entire display. the edge of the protector shows a "rainbow pattern" what i mean by that is that the edge is right on top of the boundary pixels and it shows RGB lines since the edge has an angle. also some small parts of the edges of the protector seem uneven or lack adhesive because they don't stick to the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Hernan

customer_reviews.title: It broke my phone. Avoid this model.
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector broke my screen. The shape of this protector is notched on top by the mic. My phone fell flat face down from my pocket onto flat tile in a McDonalds bathroom and the pressure from that top corner of the notched area broke the screen. Now my clock is a black spot. $1000 phone and I never know what time it is. Worst screen “protector” ever. Look for a model that covers the entire face. This one is dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly St. James

customer_reviews.title: I have been putting screen protectors on phones for many years and have never had as terrible results as this time
customer_reviews.text: After looking at various options on Amazon and reading the reviews for Iphone X screen protectors I chose this one. I am now totally baffled by the reviews. I have been putting screen protectors on phones for many years and have never had as terrible results as this time. I used all 3 protectors trying to get one to adhere without bubbles None would smooth out. And yes I followed the directions exactly with a brand new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie T

customer_reviews.title: Each protector lasted only a few weeks then shattered off
customer_reviews.text: I used these protectors for my work phone, which lives in an office environment and doesn't go on a lot of adventures... I was really disappointed at the short life of these protectors; they shattered reliably in about 2-3 weeks after I stuck them to the phone. What would happen is a small air bubble would form and as I smoothed it away, the protector would lightly crack, almost invisible, and then continue cracking until the phone was just covered in a cracked protector. I switched to another protector type as these all broke on me so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: mellabee

customer_reviews.title: The plastic guide is a good idea but flawed
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price, especially for a 3 pack. Unfortunately you may need to use all 3 before you get one aligned correctly. The plastic guide is a good idea but it is not sized correctly causing the top to be down to far. The protectors should be cut slightly larger and that could also help with proper coverage. I contacted support and they want me to remove, wipe with alcohol on a cotton ball and clean with a nitrate glove? It doesn’t matter because their guide is not cut right.
customer_reviews.author: AtomicPunk

customer_reviews.title: Good protector BUT frame isn’t meant for the iPhone 11 Pro
customer_reviews.text: These are great screen protectors, but this specific one is not exactly for the new iPhone 11 Pro. It says it is, but the frame isn’t quite tall enough. It still works, and the screen protector is still the right size, just the frame isn’t made for the 11 Pro. Hence the 4 stars. Would be nice if they made the frame the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Bought a three-pack of protectors, it lasted me a year
customer_reviews.text: TLDR: A three pack lasted me a whole year I forgot I had even bought these until I damaged my screen protector today. I came onto Amazon to buy a replacement and it said "Hey, you already bought this." So I looked in my closet and sure enough it was a three pack and I had more screen protectors to spare! These are the easiest screen protectors to install and saved me from a super costly repair (see picture of what my phone screen could have faced). These things handle drops, scrapes, keys, accidents, etc. 5/5, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Crivilare

customer_reviews.title: Wow doesn’t fit iPhone 11 lies
customer_reviews.text: This does not fix an iPhone 11 I am so unsatisfied with this product. It tells me it will fit my iPhone 11 that’s why I bought it because I’ve used it plenty of times before for my iPhone X. If I knew it was the same size I would of never reordered this I have two screen protectors left from my iPhone X
customer_reviews.author: Yuka

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality screen protector, does exactly what it prescribed to do. My only complaint is that it doesn’t stay well adhered for long. I’m about to put my third one on my phone in less than a year. These start off perfect, but after 2-3 months, a bubble begins to form under the screen, as it separates slowly from the phone. The bubble keeps growing until you get irritated enough to peel it off and put on a new one. Pretty frustrating, never had a problem like this with previous Glass screen protectors. Otherwise, it seems fairly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Titanicfanatic

customer_reviews.title: All 3 Cracked! Poor product and/or batch
customer_reviews.text: Just remembered to write this review after having a horrible experience with these screen protectors a few months back. 3 of 3 protectors delivered cracked horribly and were useless, each within 4 days of installation. Just for reference they were most definitely properly installed on phone to the manufacturer instructions. The phone when protectors shattered were inside my pocket with no sharp objects while sitting at my desk or walking through the office. These are absolutely horrible(at least the ones I received). Aside from the product being really bad itself, the instructions were clear, the alignment jig for placing the protectors was nice and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Neofocal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and Works!
customer_reviews.text: My phone had a mishap the other day and this screen protector did it’s job perfectly, taking the hit. The screen protector cracked but my phone screen was fine. This is the second time I’ve purchased these, they are by far the easiest to install, no annoying rubbing and smoothing the bubbles out. Screen sensitivity is perfect, does not scratch and fits great with my phone case. I have the iPhone XS and it fits the screen perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: David Gango

customer_reviews.title: I’m extremely impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many glass protectors in the past. Super cheap ones and super expensive ones with lifetime warranties. I have never installed a glass protector myself. I have always taken it into a device store to get it professionally installed. HOWEVER!!! I just received this in the mail and installed the screen protector by myself at home and had zero issues. NONE! The instructions are incredibly clear and easy to understand and follow. The packaging is very precise and professional. Of course, only time will tell if the screen will actually protect my phone from cracking. But as far as the application process and pricing, I’m extremely impressed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M.

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy- worse customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update- customer service contacted me in order to make it right for the faulty product. When I tried to return their emails for the offer they did not respond even with multiple attempts. Would have been great customer service if they had followed through. Have used many types of screen protectors and these were not sturdy. I haven't dropped my phone or had anything happen to it outside of regular use and the screens still cracked. After the first one I figured maybe it was a fluke and placed another of the same on. The same thing happened, nothing that should damage it and it cracked. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brinn Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: It's okay - not edge-to-edge, and started bubbling up
customer_reviews.text: The provided tools/design makes installation a breeze. Very cool. The protector is a little small compared to the screen, so that's a bummer. It has also started to bubble up in a couple of places. They do include two in a package, so I guess I'll put the second one on now (1-2mo later). The surface looks just like the iphone 11 Pro screen does. No more/less glare or smudge resistant. That's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN LAMBERT

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Tempered Glass Installation I've Ever Done
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this because it was a cheap replacement for my $40 tempered glass protector from AT&T, but I couldn't find my warranty information. Turns out this cheaper alternative also includes a lifetime warranty, and essentially comes with 3 protectors since all three phone models use the same sized screen! To top it all off, the wet/dry wipes, the placement frame, and the anti-dust sticker made this the easiest, most flawless tempered glass installation I've ever done. Not a single air bubble in site, and I didn't even have to use my finger to smooth it out (thanks to the prep tools they provided; wipes, etc). Color me impressed! I recommend this product to all.
customer_reviews.author: Devaughn SkillernTop Contributor: Raspberry Pi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my IPhone X the end of December 2017. The Apple Store had sold out of protective screens. Tried another protector screen purchased from Wall Mart. It did not go on so well. The Maxboost Glass screen protector purchased from Amazon went on the FIRST try. It fits well with the "real" Apple protective case. The Maxboost fits well and is very touch sensitive!! Would have given 5 stars but I am not sure of the actual drop protection since the screen seems a little thinner than my old screen. Have NEVER dropped a phone! Summary: Easy to install, Fits IPhone X great, and very touch sensitive!
customer_reviews.author: Furman Walter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The included screen aligner makes installation a breeze. If you are concerned about your fine motor skills rest assured this kit take out the guess work. Kit also comes with a microfiber cloth to wipe down your screen. Would also recommend an eyeglass pre-moistened alcohol wipe if you’ve been using a phone without a pretext or for some time. They are great for removing oils and such that a microfiber cloth might miss. Anyhow, once installed the phone display retains all its visual glory but now with a bit of extra protection for peace of mind. Come with 3 protectors for multiple phones - or very slippery fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Protected my screen when dropped!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed by this tempered glass screen protector! I have had it on my iPhone X ever since I got the phone a few years ago. It protected my phone screen after being dropped in sharp rocks on a hike, the screen protector had a significant crack, but the actual screen was completely fine! I was relieved to find that my screen was still fully intact after peeling off the screen protector, as I had been planning on going to get my screen replaced! This screen protector is also very easy to put on, as it comes with a device to help you put it on with. I highly recommend this screen protector!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Bang for Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck when it comes to screen protectors. The protectors are good quality and will definitely protect your phone's screen from cracks and scratches. The protector is pretty scratch resistant itself too and doesn't smudge up too much. Not to mention you get 3 of them with the wipes, dust removal stickers, and easy alignment installation. Elsewhere, you could spend this much and only get 1 screen protector but why do that when you can get 3 right here.
customer_reviews.author: Nato S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Dummy-Proof install
customer_reviews.text: 1) THREE protectors for reasonable price. 2) The frame install technique simplifies installation and eliminates alignment errors - just clean the screen, put on the alignment frame, gently lay the protector on your screen and watch the magic happen. Air bubbles not an issue. Side note: I needed to replace a scratched protector and forgot I had two more Maxboost protectors. I purchased another protector that used a glue and UV light technique. Very messy, weird smelly glue on $1000 phone and I was never able to get it to adhere to the screen. I abandoned this and on remembering I had extra Maxboost protectors, put on another one. No drama. Just get the Maxboost protectors...
customer_reviews.author: BGFallbrook

customer_reviews.title: Easiest install, great product.
customer_reviews.text: I've applied a good number of screen protectors over time and I was very impressed with the process of installing the Maxboost. Everything was well packaged to eliminate dust and scratches. Instructions were clear and the steps were simple. The guiding frame is a must have to ensure perfect alignment every time. After setting the screen in place you could see the adhesive perfectly sealing the glass to the phone. Now that it's applied the screen is just as responsive as if the glass weren't there. The phone hasn't been through any trauma but it seems durable and remains scratch free.
customer_reviews.author: MKSchmitt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for novices despite a few quirks...
customer_reviews.text: I did get some lifting in the corner. But the template frame idea is a stroke of genius. It would help the most novice of people putting on screen protectors. I would however suggest making the the frame a little stronger with less play and also I noticed it was off a tad bit. But I am a perfectionist and used to sell phones and installed all types of screen protectors everyday by hand. The only thing I loved back then was the Puregear Pureteck Roll on protectors but that involved a whole base and a lot more components. Also there was no screen rag/towel/microfiber which to me is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lozada

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, scratch resistant, not anti-glare, does not cover well the borders, gets unstuck
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector is smaller than the screen size of the iPhone X. The curves at the corners of the screen protector have a minor radius than the screen of the iPhone X. The images at the border get distorted by the screen protector. The screen protector gets “unglued” at some of the borders. I have installed 2 and both have the same issue. First photo is at 30 days after installation of first one. Second and third photo are just after installation of second screen protector: zoom in to see the irregular glue. In both cases the installation was done according to instructions, very, very carefully
customer_reviews.author: Shibui

customer_reviews.title: Such a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great 3 pack of glass screen protectors. I have been using these sine I got my iPhone XS two yeas ago. Super clear and no issues with touch capabilities. I’ve used 2 of the 3 that came in the pack. Super easy to install, super durable and scratch resistant. I’m in the construction field and always have dirty hands and these screen protectors hold up great! No cracks or breaks, but I do use an Otterbox Defender Series in conjunction with these. They say there’s a warranty but heck, for the price and quality I’m more than happy to buy them full price again.
customer_reviews.author: NJCurry

customer_reviews.title: Protects, but bubbles remained. Poor instructions, mount guide piece first!
customer_reviews.text: It bubbled - mostly rubbed out but 2 were unavoidable. This despite carding them. Ended up using 2 screens to try - instructions aren't great but your best FIRMLY SEATING THE MOUNTING PLASTIC to your phone first, then dropping on the screen protector. The instructions made it seem the protector should go into the mount first then onto phone. I'm an idiot and followed them instead of did the natural thing of mounting the guide piece plastic to phone, then mount protector with its guidance :) By the way was a brand new phone and brand new screen protector so no excuse for bubbling.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Great, so far
customer_reviews.text: Just put one on my Iphone 11 pro. So far looks great. When letting the screen protector settle onto the phone surface let it make contact in an even, slightly sloped manner so that there are no air pockets. I didn't and I had an uneven mate between the 2 surfaces, and 1 bubble. I was able to work it all out by gently pressing the protector and pushing the bubble to the edge, as well as the 2 areas that had not made contact correctly. So now I have a perfectly mated surface. But it was nervous time for fear I would crack the maxboost glass.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Kemp Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the screen protector has a guidebox to align the glass where it needs to be on your phone for easy installation. Comes with everything needed to clean your screen and apply. Only thing I can sort of dislike is that the screen protector got a chip that turned into a crack across it after I had used it about 3 weeks. That might just be the downfall of using a glass as your screen protector. The protector did its job and my phone screen was perfectly fine. The product comes with 3 screen protectors, so I simply replaced with a new screen protector and on my way!
customer_reviews.author: deeznuttz

customer_reviews.title: Saved my phone, literally
customer_reviews.text: I've had this screen protector on my phone for about 7-8 months. I was on a jog 2 weeks ago and had my phone in my hand and tripped and fell. As I fell, I literally flung the phone across the street and it dropped and then slid across the pavement for what seemed like forever. Not only is the phone screen not cracked, but even the screen protector itself is still in tact. The screen protector was also easy to install and after the 7-8 months I've never had issues with the protector peeling up or shifting on the screen. So grateful for this screen protector and will definitely buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit iPhone 11 Pro properly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my iPhone 11 Pro because of the description. It doesn’t fully cover the screen. I can actually see the edge of the protector when my phone is awake. I do not know how it’ll fit the other models listed in the title. Also, the installation tray is a good idea but didn’t work as instructed. I wasted one screen protector trying to get rid of the air bubbles with it on. I was having the same problem with air bubbles on the second protector until I removed the tray. I cannot attest to the durability as I have not dropped my phone to the point of cracking my screen.
customer_reviews.author: T Baran

customer_reviews.title: Next
customer_reviews.text: Applied each screen protector per included instructions and using included adhesive tabs for placement. Experienced lifting/bubbling on each one within a day. Contacted the Maxboost warranty team and was asked to remove the protector, clean with alcohol, and retry the installation using nitrile gloves. Not only is this tedious but I can buy another pack of screen protectors for the cost of a box of nitrile gloves. Disappointing product and warranty experience. I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use the installation guide device.
customer_reviews.text: These screen protectors seem slightly smaller than the previous ones I had - a little narrower and shorter - Not by much but I’m afraid there’s going to be all kinds of debris getting caught between the edges and the case. Also, this comes with a guide to install the screen - I think I followed the directions correctly but the protector was not aligned properly at the top. I had to peel it off the screen and re-position it by eye. The true test will come if I drop my phone. I’ve had two previous screen protectors that did their jobs, so let’s hope this one does too, if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: jkath

customer_reviews.title: Easiest screen protectors I've ever used, and great feel too
customer_reviews.text: I've always hated screen protectors mainly because of how difficult they are to properly install on phones. This one comes with a very nice and easy-to-use application tool (basically a frame that dummy-proofs the lining up of the protector). It made it so much easier and I wonder why this hasn't been a thing for years. In terms of the actual feel, it feels exactly like the bare iPhone glass, which is a plus. I haven't noticed any unnatural smudges or anything, and it wipes/cleans/polishes as well as the normal glass itself.
customer_reviews.author: John Puterbaugh

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PROTECTOR & Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This protector works. My iPhone X flew out of my hand and landed face down on hot asphalt, cracked the screen protector in multiple spots, and it saved my iPhone, whom I love dearly..... like my children. Took a few pics of my broken screen and sent it to MaxBoost and they are now shipping me a replacement screen. Excellent Customers Service and even more excellent product. Can't go wrong with this, highly recommend it. Stop reading this and go buy it now...................................... why are you still reading? ................................... Go add it to your cart and end it.......... OMG ... go now......get..... out... of .... here...... you're still here??........
customer_reviews.author: Joker

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 recommend! It's so easy to apply and you never get any annoying air bubbles- you can't even tell it's there. The bonus wipes really kept dust and dog hair from miraculously appearing. The protector lasted over three months before my phone fell - without, I'm 100% sure the screen would've cracked, but as you can see the protector took all the damage so my screen was left good as new! Even better, there's two more protectors so I can quickly just take the damaged one off and put on a new one- this is exactly as advertised and works wonderfully. Best way to keep your phone screen in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: zeviewer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good thing it was a 3 pack
customer_reviews.text: At first this seemed like it would be easy to install the screen protector. Followed the directions perfectly up to step 5, the little tab to remove the bottom layer would not pull anything off. Tried to get it started with my nail and ended up with breaking the first one. Second one the bottom came off with the tab, even with following the instructions it would not adhere to the corner of my screen and there was a big bubble that would not go away. Round 3 it’s on for the most part but still did not fully adhere to the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to break/crack - good customer service though
customer_reviews.text: The application process is outstanding (all the additional items provided in the package to assist with the application were very helpful). However, it seems to crack VERY easily. My previous protector finally cracked after 6 months due to a MAJOR drop. But I have already gone through 3 of these screens with a couple of months without any major drop. I won’t repurchase this... Update: the customer support team proactively reached out to me and offered full refund etc. to make sure my overall experience is positive. My impression about the product improved significantly with the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Corentin L.

customer_reviews.title: not big enough for iPhone 10/ helpful customer service
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT COVER IPHONE 10 fully as described. Do not buy if you have an iPhone 10- I wrote this review about 2 weeks ago and thought this was the end of it but I received a letter today offering a refund for the product, and an apology for the products shortcomings. I have never had a company be so understanding. Even if this does not fully fit the phone I absolutely recommend purchasing from this company. I sure will in the future. It is very nice to be able to purchase from a company in confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Best Screen Protector Ever
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this a hundred stars, I would. I know that sounds hyperbolic, but man, this screen protector is awesome. For something I use so much every day, quality matters. I always think positive reviews are company shills, but yeah. The guide they have to help you put it on works seamlessly! Never again will I have an off center screen protector lol The surface is also extremely smooth to the touch. Usually, screen protectors feel a little thick. Even though this is the thickness of my previous brand one (I checked beforehand. Mine had cracked after a fall.) I bought this kind of on a whim, and I’m so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Unhemmed Sky

customer_reviews.title: Bought it twice!
customer_reviews.text: These are so easy to put on even someone with shaky hands can do it. The plastic guide makes me look like a champion after giving friends back their phones with the protector perfectly placed. There is one negative. The protector is not scratch resistant. I have a bunch of tiny scratches on the right middle of my phone from sliding it in and out of my pocket where the jean rivet lays. Other than that it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Grant G.

customer_reviews.title: For the first time, no bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I've been using screen protectors on my iPhone ever since I got my 4S. The first ones were plastic but for my iPhone X I've used glass screen protectors. The Wirecutter web site recommended this product. This is the first time I've ever applied a screen protector without getting any bubbles. Not even tiny ones. To be sure I was very careful. I used the wet wipe and dry wipe followed by the dust-absorber sticker twice. I used the plastic guide to position the protector. After laying the new protector down on the phone I simply tapped the protector in the middle once, lightly, and then watched as it adhered to the glass. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hunter

customer_reviews.title: It protects your phone screen.
customer_reviews.text: With the price of screen repair...you take what you can get. This is a good product overall. Even though it is SLIGHTLY off as far as the fit to my screen. Also - if you go to install this yourself...don't. Try to take it to a professional because no matter how hard I try, there's always that ONE spec of dust/hair/dirt that makes it's way under there, giving you the unforgiving screen bubble that you don't think you'll notice when you're using your phone...but you do. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: TMFiles

customer_reviews.title: Bravo!  Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: My first impression: This is the easiest tempered glass I’ve ever put on a phone. You really can’t mess up unless you don’t prep the phone glass with the included towel and drier cloth. Once the front glass is clean, the tempered glass goes on effortlessly with the included guide. BRILLIANT IDEA! I’ve installed a number of invisishields and I don’t think I ever got one perfect like this, even with a lot of effort. And this kit comes with 3 tempered glasses for less than one of the competitors. Will update this review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Very very easy install. Template WORKED great every time.
customer_reviews.text: Very very easy install. Template WORKED great every time. Needed to order more and they supported me perfectly! Happy with product and support staff plus great communication! Staff responded very quickly! Protectors fit VERY well supersized how nice all worked! Tough glass. Wife dropped phone slightly klutzy but protector worked just like I wanted it to. Ordered new set and got reimbursed as warranty offered. Staff are great! Next order on its way fast and just in time. Will continue to support this seller/manufacturer for all our phones.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 new phones and of course wanted to protect them. It’s been so long since we got phones I didn’t know screen protectors were available in glass now. What drew me to this one was applicator frame and that it was a 3 pack. One for each phone and a mulligan. I expected to mess up one of them. The followed the instructions and the first one went on perfectly. The second phone wasn’t perfect and that got me a bit frustrated. I tried with the third and got a small air bubble that I did get out. I’ve only had the protector on a few hours but they seem really nice so far.
customer_reviews.author: TechGuy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely easy to install compared to every other screen protector I have ever bought and the screen protector holds up great, seems to be very high quality for what it is. Its also a great value. It comes with 3. I went to target to buy one before placing this order and they were all at least twice to 3 times the price of this and many of them only came with one screen protector. I would definitely recommend this product for anyone looking for a screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: Probably better ones out there
customer_reviews.text: Usually I just order any popular screen protectors off of Amazon and they generally give the same quality. This one however misses the mark by slightly less. The top right and left cutouts are not the same as the screen, so the screen protector misses the top portions and goes into the notch a bit. Does not look seamless at all. The glass also has bubbles all along the edge, even after peeling off one and giving it a second try. I usually do these flawlessly, or bubbles would form a few weeks after. These, however, had bubbles immediately. Spend your $7-$9 elsewhere, you'll most likely get better results with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: iiNo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and protects your precious.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great screen protector. Goes on flawlessly and actually protects (which I know because I dropped my phone about 10 minutes after thinking how this screen protector still looked new after 6 months. Protector cracked in 3 places but my baby was safe. I put on the second one (flawless again) and no one would ever know.) If you like really good glass screen protectors, you should try this one. If you like mediocre protection, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: SLCCody

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again or recommend
customer_reviews.text: The good: easy installation and good responsiveness. Also, bubble free - almost. The bad; I’ve had this screen protector on my iPhone X for less than 6 months and it’s chipped. I never dropped my phone and I have it in a Case-Mate case. I’ve had screen protectors on my phones for years; this never happened with any of the other ones. It doesn’t provide good screen coverage - there is quite a bit of space left between the screen and this screen protector. And lastly, this product is like a magnet for dust and it shows fingerprints like no other. I bought it because of all the good reviews but I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela T.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I didn't have to keep buying these
customer_reviews.text: If I would stop dropping my phone, these screen protectors would not have to do their job and crack instead of the screen itself. Glass is crystal clear and touch performance is flawless. Slightly smaller than the screen so, no problems with cases. I only buy this brand because it includes the plastic guide frame. Use a good microfiber cloth to clean the screen, use the stickers to remove every stick of dust, and apply using the guide. As I know well, removal is very easy when a new one is needed. With these and the case, my phone still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: CU

customer_reviews.title: Great product; easy installation!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to install/use. I bought this for my husband's new iPhone X for Christmas. The only complaint he had is that the camera/top of the screen isn't protected. He uses the Otter box and it usually comes with a built-in screen protector, but not for the X model. The holes were usually cut pretty close around the camera and flash/light, which offers more protection from scuff and scratches. I'm not sure why this screen protector just cut a huge divot out of the top, but it seems as though they could have done a better job with the design. But overall, install was easy and my hubby is happy to have a nice looking phone!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Flaminio

customer_reviews.title: The price is great. $3
customer_reviews.text: A+ product. The price is great. $3.33 per screen protector. Retail stores will sell Zagg brands that are the exact same thing for $39.99. Even though those do have guarantees on them and free replacements, for this price is much easier to use and replace them. Screen protectors will eventually get gross and not feel as smooth as the day you put it on, so I like to replace them every few months. This is a bit thinner than my last tempered glass, but it also feels much better not being raised up so high. The guide makes this easy to install too!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: The supplied frame to align the glass is a GAME.CHANGER.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a variety of tempered glass screen protectors for my family and I over the years and I had the same challenge with all of them...getting the glass to align correctly. This product completely eliminates that challenge. It has a frame that snaps around your device and you do the same steps as all the others, such as clean, wipe, dry and pray to God that a rogue dust spec doesn't invade. Once the frame is in place, slide the glass up to the top and let it literally fall in place. It adheres with literally no intervention. I was so shocked at how easy this was. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mkaxsnyder

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the “name brand ones”
customer_reviews.text: This product is just as good as the well known brand names tempered class screen protector that goes for about $50-60 In my opinion. I had that on my iPhone and it eventually was just so scratched up I needed to replace it. Wanted to try something cheaper this time around and the reviews on amazon were promising. I was NOT disappointed. I am a snob when it comes to accessories and usually buy the best of the best- ie: most expensive- but this one looks and feels and acts like the expensive ones. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Will buy again for future phones
customer_reviews.text: Great screen protector that is easy to apply and almost completely good proof! Read the instructions and use the application stickers to make putting the screen protector on a perfect fit. I put a second screen protector from this pack on my iPhone XS because the lentils screen got replaced under warranty. I sure didn’t mind that I would have to replace the screen protector since I got this multipack and it didn’t cost a fortune. The old cover was still in great shape with only the tiniest of scratches after 5 mos. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kdn27

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and works well.
customer_reviews.text: The installation kit was helpful and easy to apply. I had 2 screen savers from the Apple Store prior and they were $40 each and lifted even though they installed it with their special device. Which I thought would prevent lifting— it did not. Lifted within 2 weeks. I’ve given up on expensive screen savers. This is a 3 pack and only $15. I can go though 9 of these for the price of the Apple one. I feel like the quality is the same. I drop my phone all the time (granny hand toddler flings it). Surprisingly, the first one I’ve used has not shattered. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: A couple weeks ago my cat knock my phone down and it appeared like my screen cracked just a little. I left the screen protector on. I was just on vacation, on a bumpy boat and apparently my phone banged around in my bag and the screen looked even more cracked. I thought for sure I had to replace my phone screen. When I got home I finally took the screen protector off AND MY OHONE WAS PERFECT! I couldn’t believe it. All those scratches and cracks were only on the screen protector. It absorbed all that damage and left my phone scratch and crack free. Amazing. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Eisner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome screen protector kit
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing screen protector kit. Unlike a famous brand that rhymes with Ragg, this is vastly better, and about 1/5 the cost. First, the alignment frame actually does it's job. Sounds silly, but the famous brand's frame was utterly useless. This frame snaps on tightly and stays put. Second, the cleaning kit works quite well and left no dust or dirt behind. Last, the actual screen protector went on smoothly with zero bubbles. Third, they have a lifetime warranty and phone model upgrade program. This makes for a very affordable option, all while giving awesome protection. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: DS785

customer_reviews.title: Did not prevent my iPhone X screen from shattering
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these screen protectors. They certainly are a great price, and they do a good job at protecting against the incidental scratching your phone would likely aquire from placing it in and out of your pocket/bag, and overall usage. However, despite using this screen protector plus and otterbox communter case on my phone, the screen still shattered after a chest height (~5 foot) drop onto concrete. Interestingly the phone landed on its back, yet somehow the energy was transferred to the screen face. The screen protector also shattered. In closing, I would look else where if you want a super durable product. If you want some cheap basic protection these are okay.
customer_reviews.author: Trubbimane

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to Apply
customer_reviews.text: In the past I’ve struggled lining up screen protectors and it’s always taken multiple tries for it to just be off in the end. The frame in this product that helps you perfectly line up the screen protector is extremely helpful! I put it in perfectly first time saving me frustration and time. The screen protector works very well and I can barely tell it’s on. It’s just a regular one not a special anti glare one so didn’t expect it to do much with sun glare but turning up the brightness in my phone helps. Best screen protector product I've paid for and this is my 3rd or 4th different phone model.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah

customer_reviews.title: Great value, looks great, easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a long term review (yet) but so far I am inpressed. The price was extremely reasonable and the kit came complete with three glass screen protectors, a guide so you can’t install it crooked, and three installation kits including wet cleaning cloth, dry cleaning cloth, and debris removing stickers. I usually have trouble getting the screen completely dust free with the cheap and usually fraying microfiber wipes some competitors throw in the box, but I was able to get my screen installed with absolutely nothing trapped between the original screen and the protector. Now I have the peace of mind of two spare protectors as well as the one installed perfectly on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: 4 Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has definitely passed the drop test, many times. I went with 4 stars because I've had it for maybe a year or so and it's starting to pull up around the edges. I'm assuming this is because of the dumb rounded edges on the phone itself. It also doesn't reach all the way to the case (also because the phone is rounded), so there's a small gap all the way around. This hasn't seemed to impact the performance though, minus the pulling up already mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: M9772

customer_reviews.title: Screen protector cracked along with actual phone screen underneath
customer_reviews.text: These shatter super easily and don’t protect the phone well. The first one cracked when I dropped the phone out of my hand onto the wood floor in my apartment. No problem, I changed it out for another in the pack. The second time it cracked, I went to change it and the actual screen underneath was also completely shattered. What’s the point of having a screen protector if the screen underneath gets cracked also? I got my phone screen fixed and went with another company this time.
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and does it well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after cracking the screen protector I bought with the phone at the Verizon store. Put this on, drop my phone again less than two days later like an idiot, see that the screen protector has cracked...but only the protector, not the screen itself! That's all it takes for five stars in my book, but it helps that it comes with everything you need to put the screen on straight and free of bubbles -- the attachable screen guide ensures a perfect alignment every time, which I appreciate very much. I'll definitely keep buying these screen protectors for as long as I have an iPhone X and keep dropping it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Storey

customer_reviews.title: Very protective and durable
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed and satisfied with Maxboost!! My phone screen has been safe for 3 years because of my 3 pack of these things!! After many drops and mishaps the only thing that ever happened was I scratched or broke the screen protector!! Dropped my phone and broke my last screen protector a couple days ago and putting this thing on at the start of the New Year has me very grateful!! Had my phone for years and it’s partly because of the wonderful protection this screen has given me. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply! (But cracks easily)
customer_reviews.text: I’m updating my review because this cracked almost immediately — I had needed a new glass screen protector for quite some time but didn’t want to deal with the Apple Store. I was scared to buy and apply the glass screen protector myself for fear I would get a bubble in it or mess it up. And that would drive me crazy. But I got really desperate when it shattered, so I did some research and Wirecutter recommended this. This was so easy to apply! The tools they provided are really thoughtful. Never again overpaying for a Belkin protector!
customer_reviews.author: Phoebs

customer_reviews.title: Glad it came with three!
customer_reviews.text: Good grief, Unlucky as I am, I had just installed the screen protector and went to pick up my phone, and it fell out of my hands, landing face down. The protector cracked and shattered on the side on the first drop. I am glad it was that instead of me screen, but good grief! I am glad they gave me three. Apparently I am going to need them because this isn't very tough material. 3 stars. Meh on durability, Very easy to install and nice to have 3.
customer_reviews.author: H.Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Triples aces
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought by screen was cracked so I bought a better case. When I stripped the old screen protector off, the phone screen was just fine but it was the screen protector that had cracked. I had bought the Maxboost protector with the new case so I applied it. The instructions are straightforward and their application system is so good that I had zero problem applying it with no bubbles or other screw ups. I have the protector on for a few months and there's been no crack. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Harold D

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this protector and it was so easy! That alone is worth 5 stars. The clarity is impeccable too. I hope it works to protect my phone just as well as it adhered to my screen. They’d def secure a repeat customer if so. I’ll update later once I test its functionality / ability to actually do its job. ***UPDATE: I’ve dropped my phone twice since installing — once in my driveway and once in the garage. Combined with my shock absorbent bumper case — so far so good! Not a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: April B.

customer_reviews.title: 110% recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easiest time I’ve ever had putting a screen protector on. The guide was perfect. I could go into weird details but it’s a screen protector lol. Anyone complaining is being extremely nitpicky. Definitely recommend and will use this brand from now on over the other I have been using for years (Ailun). Update: I dropped my phone and the screen protected chipped and shattered a bit, my actual phone screen is fine. The “no fingerprints” thing however is NOT true, after a while you can definitely see fingerprints/smugdes. I’d expect this with any protector, so not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kaselyn

customer_reviews.title: Warning: NOT for IPHONE 11 PRO
customer_reviews.text: This does NOT fit the iphone 11 pro as marketed. This is iphone X glass and there is a lot of unprotected space around the iphone 11 pro glass (edges and top and bottom).
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: If you are a perfectionist, these are for you!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST screen protectors I have come across in my years of owning iPhones. If you are like me, a perfectionist, and go through multiple screen protectors to make sure it is perfect on all edges, these are for you. I have searched high and low for a screen protector that is easy to put on, durable and affordable. The plastic cover that comes with this set is PERFECTION. I'm surprised other companies don't jump on board and offer them as well. I will be ordering another set to have as a backup for my Husband and I...that is how much we LOVE these screen protectors. They are worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: K.Foster

customer_reviews.title: Easiest install ever!
customer_reviews.text: For right now since I just put it on my daughter's phone I am going to rate based on install and items in box. 1. Lots of stuff in box! 3 protectors, wet wipe and dry wipes for each of the 3. There is a guide to make it an amazingly easy install. And there are some stickers to remove dust but I didn't use them. I read instructions and it was the easiest install I've ever done! I can't comment on durability but I will update in a few months but I would recommend based on experience so far and based on past installs. Also the protector works fine with two different cases I bought for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: No more alignment issues!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good screen protector. I've had my fair share because I always seem to drop my phone. Like many other screen protectors, this one takes the hit first and protects my actual screen. What I like about this one though is the added accessory to make sure your screen protector is aligned! No matter how careful I am, I always seem to misalign my protectors. With this one though, I know for a fact it'll be centered once I lay it down.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a sturdy item but I am not Putting it on my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to put on the back of my iPhone. But the back is already shattered. So I fear that if I place this over the top of my shattered glass and then the edges of the protector fail, as often happens, I would need to remove it. Removal would, no doubt, also remove small or large portions of the back of the phone glass. So I am not planning on installing this item. I would absolutely apply this to an unbroken phone.
customer_reviews.author: Dee JenSho

customer_reviews.title: MaxBoost for the XS is a yes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these screen protectors for a while now and I’m always pleased. The adhesion is great and the clarity is wonderful. I kinda think that it makes the screen itself more clear. Before I put a screen protector on I had managed to put some surface scratches on my screen and the screen protector made them invisible as if they were never there. Plus, you get three in the box so if you screw up the first time (which I do thanks to my dogs white fur) you have backups. I would absolutely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael-Shane Maughon

customer_reviews.title: Always go with Maxboost
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many brands and this brand has ALWAYS lived up to expectation. It is sturdy and withstands drops - original screen always stays flawless with this tempered glass. Can't recommend this brand and this specific product for iPhone 11 Pro enough. Downside - they have a frame aligner that is supposed to "help" align the glass onto the screen. The aligner is not meant for iPhone 11 Pro (possibly for the iPhone X or XS) but you pretty much have to eyeball it yourself. I've bought other Maxboost screen protectors and the frame aligner usually fits the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protector shattered—my iPhone didn't
customer_reviews.text: Went hiking this morning, took a break, sat down, and promptly dropped my iPhone—direct hit to the iPhone screen on an outcropped rock. The screen protector took the full brunt impact, and disbursed the impact energy in a spiderweb pattern. Look at the photo. This protector took a bullet for my phone. Initially thought for sure it was the screen itself, so I went down to the Apple Store expecting to pay $300 for a new screen. Imagine my shocked relief when the Apple Genius guy asked me, "Mind if I peel back the protector?" Sure I said. Then he showed me my phone—100% unscathed.
customer_reviews.author: And go...

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS SCREEN PROTECTOR!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually SO bad at putting screen protectors on!!....So I was very hesitant to buy this. However, once it came in the mail and I opened the box, it was SO SIMPLE!! It comes with a piece that clips right onto the phone while putting the screen protector on, and you literally cannot mess it up! I love it! I have recommended this screen protector to all of my friends! And it's so affordable! Def beats going to the mall and paying 3 times the price!! They should make this for all phone models! My friend tried finding the same one for an Android phone, but sadly, they didn't have one. But I love mine!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Glass Screen Protector to install and best value for your wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Has to be the best screen protection glass for the money. They give you three ways to install it, all easy to understand with youtube guidance. Additionally, they provide three protectors with install materials so even if it scratches or breaks, you will not have to wait for a warranty replacement and the cost for shipping they all charge. Really impressed with the video support. I wish these guys were around 4 or 5 phones ago...
customer_reviews.author: W. L. HUGHES

customer_reviews.title: The best screen protector kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this screen protector and how easy it was to install. They give you three total screen protectors, and three sets of supplies to apply all three, which is awesome in case you mess up, or if you need a new one. The screen protector guide frame was awesome too. It really helps to make sure that the screen protector is on evenly and the right way. Absolutely love this kit, and I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rd

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, but not as durable as I’d hoped
customer_reviews.text: Totally decent for the price, and the included frame and supplies make them a breeze to apply. They go down straight and without bubbles. Beveled edges are nice too. The only downside is that none of mine lasted long - the first began showing bubbles in one corner after a month or so, and the other two cracked easily when dropped. These were not hard drops - one landed on my foot and was cracked by.... my big toenail? Not sure. The second cracked unit occurred after being banged into the edge of a glass table, and though I would have wished for better, it’s failure is understandable.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Work but not the best overall protection
customer_reviews.text: These screen protectors absolutely work, but they do not cover the entire iPhone as the description might show. One fall on the notch or the smaller part of the side, it probably will crack your screen. Instead, I got one of those screen protectors that are 10D or 11D. They work by going all the way from end to end. The screen protectors also have a black or white rim around it so it protects the rounded edges.
customer_reviews.author: V. Shah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Great Fit. Looks & Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install: Comes with a simple to snap on template/jig/guide to perfectly align the Screen protector. Great Fit: Doesn't interfere with my case or hang over the edge with unsightly "white edges" AND has a no hassle replacement warranty for this if your phone is 1 in 10,000 that the screen is slightly smaller! Looks & Works Great: Clear and responsive to your touch, you forget that is on there. The only super minor drawback is that it appears to be thicker than some other screen protectors which affects the look slightly (I'm sure its thinner than others as well).
customer_reviews.author: ikilya

customer_reviews.title: Have patience
customer_reviews.text: First of all it was easy to install and the instructions were easy to follow. I ended up using all three as I am a perfectionist and did not want any air bubble spots. After the first two attempts, I went super slow and finally was able to get the perfect placement with no bubbles. If I wasn't so crazy about the bubbles it would be given 5 out of 5. The 4 stars is really user error. So far it has held up and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Dix

customer_reviews.title: very easy installation in a dust free room
customer_reviews.text: the product installation is very straight forward, all required tools to achieve a perfect alignment and dust removal are included in the package, and they offers a set of cleaning wipes and stickers for each glass, so you have enought to do 3 complete installation the included plastic alignment template frame is dead on. good quality and great value. one important note is to make sure to register within 14 days of the purchase to activate the lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: mcistech2020

customer_reviews.title: Saved my iPhone X screen from being smashed in a closing trunk!
customer_reviews.text: So, I was carrying handfuls of grocery bags into my house and hit the automatic close button on my trunk door. Turns out my phone was resting in the trunk right where the door closes and, consequently my phone was also closed in the trunk door. I can’t believe it but... my phone screen is completely fine thanks to this quality screen protector!! My heart sunk when I first saw my phone thinking my actual screen was brutally cracked but no- it was the awesome protection of the screen protector delivering. So happy I have these at home, I ordered more just in case. Will recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Customer
customer_reviews.text: The glass looks amazing on my iphone. It does not leave bubbles in the screen. However, when I accidentally dropped my phone, the edges of the tempered glass cracked but it saved the actual screen of my phone. I contacted Maxboost regarding their lifetime warranty and replacement. The agent was so helpful, she asked for a picture of the cracked screen protector but unfortunately I didn’t think of taking a photo of it. The agent then proceeded to work on the issue and I got a replacement in the mail within 3-5 business days. It was a great experience. Their customer service is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Go to screen protector
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to screen protector. They are super easy to install and have protected mine and my families phones from broken screens for a few years now. Only downside is they scratch/crack pretty easily. Just installed one 3 days ago and now have a scratch that has mysteriously appeared. I usually leave them on until the scratches and cracks impede my viewing of the Screen then switch to the next. For the money and getting a 3pack I still feel these are worth it over other brands I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: R. West

customer_reviews.title: Protects from cracks!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve ever been compelled to write a review. Let me tell you, this screen protector is amazing! I’ve dropped my phone a few times with no consequences but on two occasions, the drops were pretty bad... I picked up my phone those times and my heart sank seeing the broken glass knowing how expensive it is to replace the screen on an iPhone! Well, after future inspection, I see that my screen protector is cracked and not my actual screen! I have no doubt in my mind that this protector took the brunt of the fall and sustained the damage leaving my iPhone unscathed.
customer_reviews.author: carole

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and thought it was great at first, until I dropped my phone. The first real time I dropped it, the screen protector had already cracked. It continued to crack more and more, so I was going to put a new one on. When I peeled the protector off, I see that my actual screen is broken as well! This product does nothing to help against cracking your screen. Also, they give you wet and dry wipes to clean your screen before applying the protector, but both of the wipes are dry. With all respect, I would give zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Zaida

customer_reviews.title: One of the best!
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my phone HARD on the sidewalk and accidentally kicked it when trying to pick it up. My phone slid face down on the cement. When I finally picked it up, the screen looked completely shattered. However, upon removing the shattered pieces, I realized that my actual screen was fine without a single crack. This is by far the best screen protector I’ve had! I couldn’t believe it but this protector really saved my phone! Also, the install was super easy and took very little time. It even comes with a piece that allows you to get the perfect fit for your phone so they the screen protector isn’t crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to apply!!!!  Lifetime warranty!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, the easiest screen protector i've ever applied. Thanks to the supplied "template" that fits snuggly over the outer edge of the iPhone X. You align the screen protecter with the top edge and let it drop, then tap the center of the glass and the protector adheres itself to the phone screen. There should be no bubbles if you let it adhere on its own. Don't help it along by pressing on the glass. If there are any bubbles, rub them towards the edge of the screen where the air can escape. Voila! Comes with a lifetime warranty if you follow the instructions on the warranty card. Easy peasy!
customer_reviews.author: KeziaPurrsTop Contributor: Violins

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not the best.
customer_reviews.text: The good: clear screen protector, none of mine had that rainbow effect from the glue. Seems to be pretty thick. I think my case does all the heavy lifting if I drop the phone but it’s a good insurance policy for the screen. The bad: it has rough edges. This makes the new iPhones that don’t have a home button kind of annoying to use sometimes. When you swipe up from bottom, your finger drags or gets caught on the edge of the screen protector. I’m going to get some edge to edge ones. Plus it doesn’t cover the camera and other sensitive components by the earpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Did not protect my iPhone screen
customer_reviews.text: My phone fell onto the driveway , and this screen protector did not protect my screen at all, it was cracked in several spots. I have had many screen protectors for my phones but never seen anything allow as much damage as this supposed screen protector allowed. I now have to pay Apple 279.00 to replace the screen. Would NOT recommend this brand because it simply doesn't do what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: ChefRose

customer_reviews.title: On my 3rd one within 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Update- they sent me a new one and also a letter for a credit for a new one. Good customer service. At first I thought this was great. But within 2 weeks I used up all of the protectors in the pack! I’m on my 3rd, which is already cracked In a couple places within one day. I haven’t dropped the phone at all this time and have no clue how it’s already cracked. The other 2 times I did drop the phone (in a case) and it got very cracked. Strange bc I’ve dropped the phone many times in the past without cracks. I’m sure it’s protecting the phone but why does the protector itself crack so easily ?
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R

customer_reviews.title: Works PERFECTLY for NEW 2018 iPhone XS
customer_reviews.text: Great price, Arrived next day, easy to follow instructions, works like any screen protector so i'm very happy. The template is an excellent new feature i have never seen. Being OCD, in the past perfectly applying a screen protector was a 15min job, with the template it made it simple and fast. I aligned the top two corners and slowly let it sit down to the bottom and the bubbles worked out on there own in seconds. Perfectly aligned on my new iphone XS
customer_reviews.author: zahid khan

product_meta.title: Maxboost Screen Protector for Apple iPhone Xs & iPhone X & iPhone 11 Pro (3 Packs, Clear) 0.25mm Tempered Glass Screen Protector with Advanced Clarity [3D Touch] Work w/Most Case 99% Touch Accurate
feature_bullets: [3 PACK] THIN IS IN - World's thinnest (0.25mm) tempered glass screen protector for iPhone X (2017) & iPhone XS (2018) & iPhone 11 Pro (2019) 5.8-inch is 100% touch accurate and compatible with 3D Touch. Protects your screen from scratches and can absorb impact!

OPEN EDGE DESIGN - The Maxboost Glass Screen Protector fully covers iPhone X's newest display, and is case-friendly due to the open edge design. Wear your favorite case and keep your screen protected at the same time!
FINGERPRINT-LESS - Coated with hydrophobic and oleophobic clear layers, the glass protects against sweat and oil residue from fingerprints, keeping your phone screen pristine all day long.

EASY TO INSTALL - Includes worry-free installation frame to provide accurate installation. Also, online installation tutorials on how to correctly install your screen protector are available. Visit our website to learn more.
LIFETIME WARRANTY - No-hassle warranty provides easy lifetime protection for your tempered glass screen protector.
